data.name: Valand
data.detailed_description:
JOIN THE DISCORD - CHAT WITH THE DEVS!


About the Game

Valand is a city-building simulator.

You have nothing except your arms and legs. However, it can't be very simple.

Barbarians are raging in the world and they are hungry for profit and easy money, your safety is above all. Rebuild houses, develop your own army, build a huge fence around your territory and do everything to survive.

Game Features:
    ▪ Dynamic day/night system
    ▪ Ability to build your own settlement
    ▪ Creation of an entire army of Vikings, ready to repel enemies
    ▪ Open world with longship travel option
    ▪ Economic system with exciting resource earning
    ▪ Game atmosphere built in the spirit of the Viking Age

data.short_description: Valand is a Viking Age city builder. With your own strength you have to rebuild the whole settlement and bring it to prosperity.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Ukrainian, German, French, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 3.9GHz / AMD FX-6300 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 3.40GHz / AMD Ryzen 5 3600X 3.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD R9 290X
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
